trans-unit.source: Represents a databindable, customized view of a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> for sorting, filtering, searching, editing, and navigation.
trans-unit.target: 代表可資料繫結、 自訂的檢視<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>用於排序、 篩選、 搜尋、 編輯和巡覽。

trans-unit.source: The DataView does not store data, but instead represents a connected view of its corresponding <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DataView 未儲存的資料，卻代表其對應的連線的檢視<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the DataView’s data will affect the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DataView 的資料變更會影響<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>’s data will affect all DataViews associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>的資料將會影響與它相關聯的所有 Dataview。

trans-unit.source: A major function of the DataView is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms.
trans-unit.target: DataView 的主要功能可讓 Windows Form 和 Web Form 上的資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a DataView can be customized to present a subset of data from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，自訂 DataView 呈現從<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>資料的子集

trans-unit.source: This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, but that show different versions of the data.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可讓您有兩個控制項繫結至相同<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，但該顯示不同版本的資料。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For example, one control might be bound to a DataView that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一個控制項可能會繫結至 DataView 顯示所有資料列在資料表中，而第二個可能會設定為顯示<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>從已刪除的資料列

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> also has a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>還有<xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This returns the default DataView for the table.
trans-unit.target: 這會傳回資料表的預設 DataView。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> on the DataView returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要建立自訂檢視，在資料表上，設定<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A><xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>所傳回的 DataView 上</xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立篩選和排序資料的檢視，請設定<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Item%2A> property to return a single <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.
trans-unit.target: 然後，使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Item%2A>屬性來傳回單一<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入和刪除使用的資料列集中<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use those methods, the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the DataView.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這些方法，<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>屬性可以設定為指定只刪除資料列或新的資料列會顯示由 DataView。</xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows``DataRowCollection`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您未明確指定的排序準則`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的物件`DataView`排序依據的 DataView 的對應索引`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows``DataRowCollection`。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> by using [!INCLUDE[vbtecLinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]可讓開發人員建立複雜且功能強大的查詢<xref:System.Data.DataSet>使用[!INCLUDE[vbtecLinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢傳回的列舉<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件，不過，輕鬆地不是使用中的繫結案例。</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: DataView can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從建立 DataView[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢，並且篩選和排序查詢的特性。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] extends the functionality of the DataView by providing [!INCLUDE[vbtecLinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/add/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]藉由提供的擴充功能的 DataView[!INCLUDE[vbtecLinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]運算式為基礎的篩選和排序，如此便能更複雜且功能強大的篩選和排序比以字串為基礎的篩選和排序作業。

trans-unit.source: See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[資料繫結和 LINQ to DataSet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the component is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出元件是否已初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示元件已完成初始化，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the data source is currently open and projecting views of data on the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源目前是否開放且投影出資料的檢視上<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataView> is a "view" on a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> because it provides custom sorting and filtering of the data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.DataView>位於 「 檢視 」<xref:System.Data.DataTable>因為它會提供自訂的排序和篩選資料。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: The IsOpen property can be queried to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.DataView> has been opened by using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: IsOpen 屬性可以查詢來判斷是否<xref:System.Data.DataView>使用已開啟<xref:System.Data.DataView.Open%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataView.Open%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被設計為僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataView.Close%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用對應的<xref:System.Data.DataView.Close%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Data.DataView>.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reserved for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: 保留僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來篩選檢視中的資料列之運算式<xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To form a RowFilter value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on.
trans-unit.target: 若要形成 RowFilter 值，指定的名稱後面接著一個運算子和值做為篩選條件的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The value must be in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 值必須以引號。

trans-unit.source: For example: "LastName = 'Smith'" See the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: 例如:"LastName = 'smith ' 距離 「 請參閱<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>類別，如需詳細資訊。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>

trans-unit.source: To return only those columns with null values, use the following expression: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'"
trans-unit.target: 若要僅傳回那些資料行具有 null 值，請使用下列運算式:"Isnull （Col1，'Null 資料行'） = 'Null 資料行' 」

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要篩選的資料列的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row state filter used in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用中的資料列狀態篩選<xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Only rows that have been deleted by using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method will have their RowStateFilter value set to `Deleted`.
trans-unit.target: 只有使用已刪除的資料列<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法會有其 RowStateFilter 值設定為`Deleted`。</xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Those rows added using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> method will similarly have the property set to `Added`.
trans-unit.target: 加入使用這些資料列<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>方法同樣必須將屬性設為`Added`。</xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 使用<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>類別並不表示資料列將會標示為`Deleted`。</xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法改為先確定這類的資料列都可在<xref:System.Data.DataView>.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: New rows will also be visible when the RowStateFilter is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`.
trans-unit.target: 新的資料列就也會看到當設為 RowStateFilter`ModifiedCurrent`或`CurrentRows`。

trans-unit.source: Deleted rows will also be visible when the RowStateFilter is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`.
trans-unit.target: 已刪除資料列就也會看到當設為 RowStateFilter`ModifiedOriginal`和`OriginalRows`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.DataViewRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort column or columns, and sort order for the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定排序資料行或資料行和排序次序<xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of its corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows``DataRowCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未明確指定的排序準則`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的物件`DataView`會根據其相對應的索引排序`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows``DataRowCollection`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Dataview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the column name followed by "ASC" (ascending) or "DESC" (descending).
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含資料行名稱，後面接著"ASC"（遞增） 或"DESC"（遞減）。

trans-unit.source: Columns are sorted ascending by default.
trans-unit.target: 依預設遞增排序資料行。

trans-unit.source: Multiple columns can be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 可以以逗號分隔多個資料行。
